quote: The economy is the strongest it's ever been. Believe me, folks!
We built the greatest economy in the history of the world. Then China sent us the virus, but we're rebuilding stronger than ever!
We have the biggest tax cuts in history. Huge, just huge!
Our tax cuts are bringing jobs back to America like never before.
Fake news is the enemy of the people. You know it, I know it!
The mainstream media is totally corrupt. They don’t report the truth!
We’re gonna make great deals, the best deals. America first!
Other countries have been taking advantage of us for decades. Not anymore!
We’re building the wall. Mexico will pay for it!
We have to stop illegal immigration. We’re bringing law and order back!
Our military is stronger than ever before. We’re bringing the best people in!
We totally rebuilt the United States military. The best military in the world!
Obamacare is a disaster. We are going to repeal and replace it!
We will always protect pre-existing conditions. Always!
We’re leading the world in technology. America is back on top!
5G is a huge deal. We’re making sure America wins the race!
We had the most secure election in history, but they still tried to rig it!
We need election integrity! Voter ID, paper ballots, and same-day voting!
China has been ripping us off for years, but not anymore!
We made the USMCA deal, a huge win for American workers!
We have the cleanest air and water in the world. Nobody talks about it!
We love our energy industry. American energy is the best, folks!
We love our police. They do an incredible job, believe me!
We will never defund the police. Law and order will prevail!
We need to bring back school choice. Parents should have control!
Critical race theory is destroying our kids. We must stop it!
Jobs, jobs, jobs! We’re bringing them back to America!
Lowest unemployment ever! We’re making America work again!
China has been taking advantage of us for decades, but I stopped it!
China is a big threat, folks. We need to stay strong!
Nobody has been tougher on Russia than me. Nobody!
We had peace through strength. Russia knew not to mess with us!
Iran was under control until Biden gave them billions of dollars!
The Iran deal was the worst deal in history. We got out of it!
We had a great relationship with North Korea. No nuclear war!
They respected us. Now they don’t. Weak leadership!
We will always protect your Second Amendment. Always!
The Democrats want to take your guns. We won’t let it happen!
We will always stand for the national anthem!
We will keep America great. We will never let socialism take over!
I am the best negotiator. We make the best deals!
Nobody knows how to run a country like I do. Nobody!
We will restore free speech and end government censorship.
The fake news media is a threat to our country.
We will hold accountable those who have abused our justice system.
Our election system has been rigged. We need to ensure election integrity.
We must protect our borders and stop illegal immigration.
We will build fair trade relationships with nations around the world that protect American interests.
